Name: Robert
description:
Robert is an organic and Fair Trade certified oil palm farmer who lives in Asuom in the Kwaebibirem District of the Eastern Region of Ghana, West Africa.

He is 44 years old and married with three children, two of which are still in senior high school and the rest are at the basic level of education.

Robert believes organic oil palm is profitable and helps protect the environment. In this regard, he wants to secure a Kiva microloan to help him weed and prune his oil palm fields.
